kpi_info.title: M8006C163
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of initial EPS bearer setup attempts for GBR DRBs of QCI3 characteristics. UPDATED: Receipt of a S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated with the number of QCI2 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE.
